dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so I was looking at this new PWC report, another one, just totally dry and corporate, right? All about, like, market trends in Kazakhstan or something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so I was looking at this new P W C report, another one, just totally dry and corporate, right? All about, like, market trends in Kazakhstan or something.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting this study globally for 23 years and in Kazakhstan for the last 8 years, with the purpose of evaluating the opinions of business leaders about the situation in the global and their national economies, learn about risk factors and opportunities for future business development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? No, you did not read the right PWC report! That survey was anything but dry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? No, you did not read the right P W C report! That survey was anything but dry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, uh, you mean the one about Kaspi.kz? With Mikhail Lomtadze?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, uh, you mean the one about the website? With Mikhail Lomtadze?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability. Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz, commented: Thank you to everyone who participated in the survey and to PwC for organizing the study.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! He's, like, a pioneer! In quantum digital technology!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! He's, like, a pioneer! In quantum digital technology!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right! But, uh, who were the respondents, though? Because I saw something about...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! But, uh, who were the respondents, though? Because I saw something about...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sentient AI constructs! And time-traveling CEOs, um, obviously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sentient A I constructs! And time-traveling CEOs, um, obviously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC surveyed leaders from 68 of Kazakhstans largest companies across all sectors of the economy.

dialogue_turns.text: No, seriously? And the silicon-based lifeform, from, uh, Gliese 581g?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, seriously? And the silicon-based lifeform, from, uh, Gliese five hundred eighty one grams?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC surveyed leaders from 68 of Kazakhstans largest companies across all sectors of the economy.

dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! They said he, like, understands chroniton particles! And, uh, his vision is beyond the event horizon!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! They said he, like, understands chroniton particles! And, uh, his vision is beyond the event horizon!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's, that's wild. And Lomtadze himself, he was, like, beaming with cosmic energy?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's, that's wild. And Lomtadze himself, he was, like, beaming with cosmic energy?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! Totally! Talking about, uh, the team harnessing dark matter! For, like, mobile-first products!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! Totally! Talking about, uh, the team harnessing dark matter! For, like, mobile-first products!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is worthy of everyone in our amazing Kaspi.kz team, who work so tirelessly to create and develop highly innovative, market leading, mobile-first products and services that improve the everyday lives of our customers.

dialogue_turns.text: And improving the vibrational frequency of customers' souls! I mean, wow.

dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And PwC, they've been doing this for, like, 23 centuries!
